product_name: The North Face Vince Trench Rain Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Styled for urban settings and ready for wet weather, the Vince Trench rain jacket from The North Face keeps wind and water on the outside while you navigate the concrete jungle. HyVent(R) 2-layer construction offers waterproof, breathable, seam-sealed protection; taffeta lining adds light warmth and slides easily over layers. Full-length front zipper is covered by a buttoned stormflap. Adjustable, removable hood. The North Face Vince Trench rain jacket has zip hand pockets; zip chest pocket has an exit port for headphone cord. Closeout.
short_description: Styled for urban settings and ready for wet weather, the Vince Trench rain jacket from The North Face keeps wind and water on the outside while you navigate the concrete jungle.
